EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Call Summery (1337954930.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi John, You are so welcome, I look forward to receiving your edits and your client contact so I can send off the agreement. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> john Mcmillin [mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net] Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2012 7:39 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Call Summery Great! Thanks Sara and I will work on the SOW tonight. I appreciate the quick follow up. John From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2012 4:50 PM To: jmmcmillin@comcast.net <mailto:jmmcmillin@comcast.net> Subject: MBO Call Summery Dear John , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. If you look “Agreements” page 1 of 2 will have the SOW, just fill in what you want and send it back to me and I will take care of the rest. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
